tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_modifications (
  modification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  table_name VARCHAR(255),
  column_name VARCHAR(255),
  old_value TEXT,
  new_value TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_access_logs ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  user_id INT, 
  access_type VARCHAR(50), 
  data_id INT 
);

CREATE TABLE data_modification_logs ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  user_id INT, 
  modified_data_id INT, 
  action VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  table_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_access_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  access_type VARCHAR(50),
  table_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_modification_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  modification_type VARCHAR(50),
  table_name VARCHAR(50),
  affected_rows INT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_access_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action_taken VARCHAR(255),
  access_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_modification_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  table_name VARCHAR(255),
  operation VARCHAR(50),
  old_value TEXT,
  new_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_protection_audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action_taken VARCHAR(255),
  data_source VARCHAR(255),
  encryption_key VARCHAR(100)
)
